<English>: When researching all modifications at each tier, you will receive bonus RP for the vehicle being researched in the amount of {bonus}% of the sum of RP spent on researching all modifications of that tier.
New hydraulic boosters improve plane's controllability
Checking and tweaking of compressor provides maximum engine power.
Cleaning of radiator and cooling system makes engine cooling more effective.
Rebuilding and tuning of the engine, replacement of worn engine with a new one.

Replacement of damaged airframe elements increases overall plane's durability and flight performance due to weight reduction. For some planes it means that you get a new plane with undamaged airframe.
Regular maintaining of cover and replacement of damaged cover parts increases overall plane's durability and flight performance, due to weight reduction.
Replacement of damaged elements of fuselage skinning, removal of openings, and surface finish to reduce air drag.
Replacement of damaged elements of wing skin, removal of openings, and surface finish to reduce air drag.
G-Suit makes it easier to carry overload
G-Suit makes it easier to carry overload
Set of %smm belts for offensive weapons.
Set of %smm belts for turret weapons.
The %smm cannons' worn barrels, trigger and striking mechanisms are replaced with new ones, to improve fire density and to decrease the chance of seizure.
The %smm turret machine guns' worn barrels, trigger and striking mechanisms are replaced with new ones, to improve fire density and to decrease the chance of seizure.
The %smm turret cannons' worn barrels, trigger and striking mechanisms are replaced with new ones, to improve fire density and to decrease the chance of seizure.
